summary: The National Mediation Board (NMB) helps airlines and railways and their related unions resolve labor disputes that could disrupt commerce in those industries. We are required by law to review NMB’s programs and activities every 2 years. NMB implemented our prior recommendation to improve ethical standards for employees seeking outside employment; 6 others remain open. Also, NMB doesn’t have the tools to effectively manage its...
title: National Mediation Board: Additional Actions Needed to Fully Implement Prior GAO Recommendations and Improve Agency Management and Oversight
